page.title: 10NOTABLE LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: {NOTABLE LOCAL EVENTS. {THE THUNDERSTORM. ONE TUESDAY NIGHT IN APRIL 1984 A SEVERE STORM HIT THE AREA.BEFORE THE STORM WE HAD INSTALLED A SHED FULL OF CHICKENS,AND ON THAT NIGHT, MOST OF THE CHICKENS WERE KILLED.WE HAD ABOUT 50 SURVIVING CHICKENS OUT OF A TOTAL OF 1,000.NO ONE KNOWS WHAT ACTUALLY HAPPENED.SOME PEOPLE THOUGHT THEY HAD BEEN ELECTROCUTED,HAD DIED OF FRIGHT,OR HAD BEEN SUFFOCATED.WE WILL PROBABLY NEVER KNOW WHAT HAPPENED. {DUTCH ELM DISEASE.} ONE MONDAY WHEN WE CAME BACK TO SCHOOL THE SCHOOL ELM TREE(WHICH WAS ABOUT 155yrs.OLD)HAD BEEN CUT DOWN BECAUSE OF{DUTCH ELM DISEASE.}I WAS VERY SORRY THAT IT HAD TO BE CUT DOWN.WE USED TO PLAY IN IT AND HANG ON THE BRANCHES.NOW ALL WE HAVE LEFT IS THE TREE STUMP.
